page.title: 03DUFTON VILLAGE SURVEY
page.content: A house to house survey was made which included 80 of the inhabitants of the village.This comprised 35 households & included: 9 school-age children 38 persons at work 25 retired people. {Place of birth:} 21 were born in Dufton and 25 were born within 20 miles. {Mobility:} 7 have lived all over the country 18 have lived elsewhere in the North 5 come from the Midlands and 8 have lived abroad. {Travel to work:} Of those who are in paid employment, half travel by car, 7 walk, 2 travel by Works' bus, 1 by motorbike, 1 by tractor & 8 work at home.
